ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR(ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(Status__c)), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Final"), Count_of_Sessions_Without_Fee_Rates__c <> 0, NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type__c, "Drop In")), NOT($Permission.Override_Course_Validation) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: One or more sessions is missing a practitioner fee rate. You may need to work with a system administrator to ensure that Practitioner Band, Branch Weighting and Fee Rate data all exists, covering the dates of your sessions.
